price: faraonu i Hamanu i Karunu, ali su oni rekli: “Čarobnjak i lažov!”
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wahāmāna waqārūna faqālū sāḥirun kadhābun
